transcript: let's talk about romance this is where in my opinion it gets a little bit scary there are many people who are sub-optimal mates the bottom tier of society as you define it by status have a harder time getting mates well what if you studied a million Tinder conversations to get the first date well there'll be tools probably called first date AI that can AI from first convo all the way to the date getting set take it a step further pen pals people who wrote letters to each other back and forth back and forth back and forth for years and they fell in love well what if you remove the person altogether it's just a company that provides you with romance so let's take it a step further we have the phone version of this and you can hear a voice that has been tuned to your preferences that talks to you and listens to you and all of a sudden you fall in love with a robot
